name: Robert C. Martin
bio: Known as Uncle Bob, is an American software engineer and instructor. He is one of the authors of the Agile Manifesto.

name: Andrew Hunt
bio: Andrew Hunt is an author of books on software development, a co-author of The Pragmatic Programmer and one of the 17 original authors of the Agile Manifesto.

name: Douglas Crockford
bio: American computer programmer and entrepreneur who is best known for his ongoing involvement in the development of JavaScript.

name: Erich Gamma
bio: Swiss computer scientist and co-author of the influential software engineering textbook, Design Patterns.

name: Al Sweigart
bio: Professional software developer and author of several open source Python books for beginners.

name: Martin Fowler
bio: British software engineer, author and international public speaker on software development.

name: Marijn Haverbeke
bio: Developer of the Eloquent JavaScript book and the CodeMirror editor.

name: John Sonmez
bio: Founder of Simple Programmer and author of Soft Skills: The software developer's life manual.

name: Steve McConnell
bio: Author of several software engineering textbooks including Code Complete and Rapid Development.

name: Eric Freeman
bio: Computer scientist, author and former CTO at Disney Online.

name: Abdul Wahab
bio: An experienced Software Engineer specializing in Python-based backend and full-stack development, known for building scalable, secure, and production-ready applications.
